ygData.subject: Re: Thinking about adventuring to Guk tonight- advice    needed
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can just solo one at level 8 (soloed some of them at that time, but never got woven at the time). I haven t met Froglok foragers, only fishermen, and
ygData.messageBody:
According to Donald Taber:
> When I went there to kill Foragers and Hunters I was 13th and could solo
> 3 on my own. I would say you could probably solo them at 8th to 10th level.
> You do have to be careful with the Hunters because they will attack you on
> sight, so you can end up with others joining the fight.

You can just solo one at level 8 (soloed some of them at that time, but
never got woven at the time). I haven't met Froglok foragers, only fishermen,
and those are rumored to have woven too.

--
